Will you provide specific classes for Aspergic Pupils and create qualified teachers with the understanding
of these disabilities.  Pupils need to be able to express their learning  difficulties and receive the additional time to identify with their lack of social skills.
 Mainstream pupil s are generally unaware of this condition and can often to resort to bullying tactics towards Aspergic pupils.Schools could raise a little more awareness of this condition with other pupils
to promote a better understanding.
